Original: Hm? A crashed explorer? Oh, Raht...
Yeah, I know him. The kid who went
down in the Sacred Mountains, right?
[Page]
Hmm, though... Where did I see him?
It's on the tip of my tongue...
[Page]
I feel like I might remember if you
gave me [Number:1]en... Can you help
a fellow explorer out?
Translation: Hm? A crashed explorer? Oh, Raht...
Yeah, I know him. The kid who went
down in the Sacred Mountains, right?
[Page]
Hmm, though... Where did I see him?
It's on the tip of my tongue...
[Page]
I feel like I might remember if you
gave me [Number:1]en... Can you help
a fellow explorer out?

Original: [Color:5]Pay him [Number:1]en?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Pay him [Number:1]en?[Color:0]

Original: Oh... I forgot it... completely. What
a shame. But I might remember later,
so ask again if you change your mind.
Translation: Oh... I forgot it... completely. What
a shame. But I might remember later,
so ask again if you change your mind.

Original: Huh... doesn't seem like you have
quite that much. It's a shame, but
I don't think I can remember now.
Translation: Huh... doesn't seem like you have
quite that much. It's a shame, but
I don't think I can remember now.

Original: Great doing business with you. Does
anyone ever tell you you're kind of
gullible? Anyway...
Translation: Great doing business with you. Does
anyone ever tell you you're kind of
gullible? Anyway...

Original: Huh? You want to hear it again?
Fine... Hmm, what was it...?
Translation: Huh? You want to hear it again?
Fine... Hmm, what was it...?

Original: Ooh, I think my memory's coming
back to me!
[Page]
Yeah... I was searching the south half
of the Sacred Mountains. That's the
C and D rows on a map.
[Page]
I saw Raht somewhere around there,
I just can't remember exactly where...
No, I really meant that this time.
Translation: Ooh, I think my memory's coming
back to me!
[Page]
Yeah... I was searching the south half
of the Sacred Mountains. That's the
C and D rows on a map.
[Page]
I saw Raht somewhere around there,
I just can't remember exactly where...
No, I really meant that this time.
